price: Kun tola Rabbiiti Isa abbaa fedheef kenna. Rabbiin abbaa tola guddaati.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: dhālika faḍlu al-lahi yu'tīhi man yashāu wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi
